item.title: Press 'Esc' to pull up the main menu while in-game. (Zenless Zone Zero)

item.title: Click 'More' from the row of icons at the bottom of the screen. (Zenless Zone Zero)
item.link: https://www.pcgamesn.com/zenless-zone-zero/codes?code=Click 'More' from the row of icons at the bottom of the screen.

item.title: Select the 'Redemption Code' icon from the pop-up menu. (Zenless Zone Zero)
item.link: https://www.pcgamesn.com/zenless-zone-zero/codes?code=Select the 'Redemption Code' icon from the pop-up menu.

item.title: Copy and paste any of our ZZZ codes into the textbox. (Zenless Zone Zero)

item.title: Navigate to your mailbox via the 'More' menu to claim your rewards. (Zenless Zone Zero)
